Disease.content:

Paragraph: There was a statistically longer time to first episode of nausea ( P = . 0015 ) and vomiting ( P = . 0001 ) , and fewer patients were administered additional antiemetic medication in the 10 - micrograms / kg dosing groups than in the 5 - micrograms / kg dosing group .

Let's think step by step.

```
| --- |
| Nausea |
| Vomiting |
```
The two disease entities in the paragraph are "nausea" and "vomiting".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid disease entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

The paragraph only mentions "nausea" as a disease entity. "Vomiting" is not a disease, but a symptom of nausea. Therefore, it should not be included as a disease entity.
